name: Eternal (jcoope88)
description:
How to play:

- 'W' and 'S' to go up and down

- Explode 3 times and you die.  Avoid the bombs at all costs!

Dev Notes:

This is my first game. Developed in Unity and inspired from Blackthornprod's YouTube tutorial series.  A special thanks to him for guiding me, check out his content here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g 

Features I want to implement:

-Different difficulties
